attributes.action: Change the rules on creating and signing a petition being Just a few clicks.
attributes.background:
It is far too easy to create and sign a petition, as i am demonstrating. There is 'social media pressure' applied facilitated  by it being so easy to share.
The creator of a petition has so little to do and should have to put much more effort in to get it going.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.You could start a new petition calling for a specific change to the process for starting a petition.
